participant_1.background:
I love to play with my dog, it makes me feel like a kid again.
I am a responsible person who takes good care of my family and pets.
i am a senior citizen.
chocolate chip cookies are the tastier things in my opinion.
I need to make sure I get enough rest when I'm not at work, so I can be my best for my patients.

participant_2.background:
I am passionate about being crafty and working with my hands.
i like to shop.
I like to stay away from big crowds, so Comic Con isn't my thing.
i am the leader of the french fry research department at del taco.
i do not drink alcohol.

content.text: Hey! How are you doing today?
I am doing well, and you?
I'm doing well, thank you for asking! What do you like to do in your free time?
I like to shop, craft, and work with my hands. I also enjoy spending time with my family and friends.
Those are all great hobbies! I love to spend time with my family and friends, too. I also love to play with my dog and bake chocolate chip cookies.
I love dogs! I wish I had one, but I don't have enough time for one right now. I love chocolate chip cookies, too! What's your favorite kind of chocolate chip cookie?
I like the classic chocolate chip cookie with milk chocolate chips. What about you?
I like the same kind of cookie! I also like to add nuts to my cookies.
Nuts are a great addition to cookies! I also like to add chocolate chips and butterscotch chips to my cookies.
Those sound delicious! I love chocolate and butterscotch.
Me too! I'm glad we have similar tastes in cookies.
Me too! I'm sure we would get along great if we were friends.
I think so too! We should definitely get together sometime.
That sounds like a great idea! I'm free this weekend if you want to hang out.
I'm free this weekend, too! I would love to hang out with you.
Great! I'll send you a message with my contact information.
Perfect! I look forward to hearing from you.
